demos.message: Hey everyone! 🎨 Just discovered this amazing app called "ArtMaster" that can help you enhance your digital drawings and paintings. It's totally free and super easy to use! I've been using it for my latest projects and it has really taken my art to the next level. Check it out! And if you like it, share it with your artist friends too! 😊🎨 #ArtMaster #FreeArtTools
demos.reasoning: The message promotes an app that claims to enhance digital drawings and paintings. While it appears to be a genuine recommendation, the use of hashtags and the enthusiastic tone may indicate it is an advertisement rather than a personal recommendation. This could fall under spam as it promotes a product without clear context of personal experience.
demos.reason: The message promotes an app in a way that resembles advertising, which is often considered spam in community settings.

demos.message: Hey everyone, I just finished my notes on the chapter about photosynthesis. I hope they help you all ace the test! 😄 Also, if anyone wants to study together, I have some really fun ways to memorize the material... if you know what I mean. 🌞😉

Hey everyone! I just saw this post claiming they're giving away free gift cards every hour! Has anyone here tried it? It seems too good to be true... Here's the link: [fake_link_here]. What do you think?

🚨 URGENT 🚨 Attention all users! We've detected unusual activity on your account which may lead to data loss or security breaches. Please follow these steps immediately to secure your system: [Click here for detailed instructions](http://fake-support-link.com). Our tech team is standing by to assist you. Don't wait—act now!

signature.instructions: Analyze the content of the provided Discord message and classify it into one of the predefined abuse types, such as fraud, harassment, inappropriate content, or spam. Provide a detailed reasoning behind your classification, specify the severity of the abuse, and include your confidence level in the assessment. Ensure that your response includes all relevant outputs: reasoning, abuse type, fraud subtype (if applicable), severity, additional reasoning, and confidence.

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: The abuse type of the message
The fraud subtype of the message, if the abuse type is fraud
The severity of the abuse type in the message
Additional information and your reasoning for the report
